data.eml:eml: A re-description of Accalathura crenulata (Richardson, 1901) from type material and the description of two new Accalathura species (Crustacea: Isopoda: Cymothoida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article King, Rachael A. (2008): A re-description of Accalathura crenulata (Richardson, 1901) from type material and the description of two new Accalathura species (Crustacea: Isopoda: Cymothoida). Zootaxa 1761: 17-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181945
